text.author: Caustic Soda
text.summary: In this episode Dr. Rob and others discuss addiction, the loss of control over a behavior despite a desire to stop, and explore its various forms including drug abuse, alcoholism, sex addiction, problem gambling, internet addiction, and video game addiction, as well as psychological, neurobiological and treatment differences between addiction and obsessive-compulsive disorder.
text.title: Addiction
